abstract: Although CBS broadcast mostly reruns on Thursday, it still managed to earn the most viewers over all, thanks in part to “Survivor.” According to Nielsen’s estimates, 12.1 million viewers tuned in to the reality show at 8 p.m., relatively low for the series but enough to outperform all other programming on the night.
lead_paragraph: Although CBS broadcast mostly reruns on Thursday, it still managed to earn the most viewers over all, thanks in part to “Survivor.” According to Nielsen’s estimates, 12.1 million viewers tuned in to the reality show at 8 p.m., relatively low for the series but enough to outperform all other programming on the night.

headline.main: Ratings: CBS Wins on Viewers but Loses to NBC on Young’uns
